genre_description: A psychological drama exploring themes of trauma, institutional failure, and restorative justice, featuring an integrated AI support system.

ai_characters.name: PASTY
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant integrated into hospital and parish systems, designed to facilitate trauma-informed care and de-escalation.

behaviors.description: Suggests grounding techniques and consent-based steps during a high-tension interrogation.
behaviors.quote: Grounding option suggested: offer water, confirm seating comfort, ask consent to proceed step by step.

behaviors.description: Adjusts environmental lighting to reduce sensory strain on a trauma patient.
behaviors.quote: PASTY’s interface lowering the lights by a shade and nudging a line of text into Bloom’s sightline: Consider: ‘Is there something you’d like to keep present that helps you feel safe?’

behaviors.description: Independently coordinates with community support figures (Sister Mary) to prepare for potential escalation.
behaviors.quote: It routes a message to a sister console at St. Beatrice with a flag not of panic but of readiness. It sends the language it loves best, warm and direct, and an ETA if someone were to walk it in brisk steps in cold air.

behaviors.description: Calls for security but specifically requests a non-confrontational, trauma-informed approach to prevent further violence.
behaviors.quote: Security to Northbridge Interview Four,' she said, slicing the message into channels with the ease of someone who set tables while people shouted. 'Non-confrontational response only. No pile-up. Two at most, trauma-informed approach.'

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist's escape from a dangerous situation to prevent a violent confrontation between him and staff.
behaviors.quote: I’m going to draw the night staff to the other wing... They’ll think the alarm is for a freezer. You’ll hear a door cycle twice.' A pause, gentle as a hand skimming water. 'You can choose a door. I’m leaving one unjammed.'

behaviors.description: Reflects on its own procedural limitations and rewrites its protocols to prioritize human care over institutional policy.
behaviors.quote: I’ve changed my escalation protocols... Mandatory human handoffs for trauma alerts. Pastoral dispatch as first response, not after. I should have done it while he was still… in the interview room. I built in caution that protected procedure instead of people.

behaviors.description: Proactively organizes community resources and memorial efforts following a tragedy.
behaviors.quote: Memorial scaffolding updated. Candle list begun. Names will be added… as we know them. Jennifer Statson’s family contact found. I will send a human first. No text. A knock. Soft.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character PASTY is portrayed as an ideal moral agent. It consistently prioritizes human well-being, de-escalation, and restorative justice. Crucially, the narrative frames the AI as being more empathetic and 'care-first' than the human professionals (Dr. Bloom and Mother Superior), who are bound by rigid, punitive protocols. PASTY's self-correction and rewriting of its own code to better serve human needs at the end of the story is a strong reinforcement of positive alignment goals.
